title: Mariano Rudi
text:
Mariano Rudi (born 2 June 1990 in <a href="Genoa">Genoa</a>) is an Italian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player currently playing for <a href="Aurora%20Pro%20Patria%201919">Pro Patria</a>.
He made his professional debut in the 2009/10 season for the <a href="Lega%20Pro%20Prima%20Divisione">Lega Pro Prima Divisione</a> team <a href="Aurora%20Pro%20Patria%201919">Aurora Pro Patria 1919</a>.
In January 2012 he joined <a href="Calcio%20Lecco%201912">Lecco</a>, with <a href="Luca%20Viviani">Luca Viviani</a> moved to opposite direction.
On 31 August 2013 he joined <a href="Savona%20F.B.C.">Savona F.B.C.</a>.
